tags: Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Akshay for my sister’s treatment when she was suffering from Dengue. Dr. Akshay was extremely helpful, patient and comforting in this troubled situation for us. He explained the issue very well and suggested remedies which could be undertaken in the comfort of one’s home. He emphasised on the importance of diet and liquid intake which helped my sister ultimately recover from her sickness. I also visited Dr. Jeevan Jain (Dr. Akshay’s father) for this purpose and I’m extremely happy with both the doctors especially with their friendly attitude towards their patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: After moving to Mumbai, I have been visiting Dr. Akshay from past 2 years. Ist thing that sets him apart is he listens to his patients. He stays updated about current disease in city.His diagnosis and writing proper medication has helped me and my husband get well. Thank you Practo, I found the doctor here.Thank you Dr. Akshay. May you keep healing people and helping them in pain. Best wishes.

** ** * **** **** ****** **** ********* ************** Being Deaf & Mute and suffering from sore throat,  mild fever and headache,  he checked up and prescribed pills with precautions like avoid cold drinks,  etc. I got well in two days. Strongly recommended for him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ****** *** *** ***** **** * ******* ************* *** ******** Suggested home remedies and hung up. We called him back to understand the medication, ** ******* **** ** ** **** * ***** to ask what medication he’s prescribing and how it would soothe the symptoms. 

He didn’t even bother sending a prescription, wrote a list of medication in a message. When we asked him for a prescription, he sent his staff’s number and asked us to call them since he was busy with an emergency. 

I understand emergencies can be uncertain and need to be prioritised but at least have the professional courtesy to let us know and postpone the appointment instead of talking for 5 minutes and not even bothering with a proper prescription. ****** *** **** ******* ********* ****** **** **** *** ************* ********* * ******** I would highly suggest against consulting with him. ** *** ** * **** ****** *** *** * ************ ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: thanks a lot De. Akshay Jain you helped me feel better after taking your prescribed medication I am able to relive a acidity free life. thanks for advice for full health checkup look up to you for any health issue. your medicines worked magic for me. thanks again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Jain took the time to explain that my foot pain may be caused by different factors, he went through them all and discussed various tests I could take to eliminate them being the cause.

He took the time to call me once the tests were through and spent time explaining the reports and what treatment I should take.

Dr Jain is a very caring, patient Dr with a great bedside manner. 

Would I go back to see Dr Hain - absolutely 
Would I recommend him - yes absolutely

review: Dr Jain is extremely warm and makes a patient feel comfortable. He's my entire family's go to doctor now, however big or small the ailment may be. His treatments have always worked and he's also been extremely approachable, explaining everything in detail. I'd like to thank Dr Jain for all his help.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Akshay Jain is simply amazing. A brilliant doctor and an even better human being. *** ***** ********* ** ********* *** his behaviour is top notch. It didn't feel like I was getting treatment for the first time but as if he was a family doctor. He is one of those rare doctors who have kept the human element alive. Thanks a lot. Highly recommended.
Very friendly doctor, listens patiently and sorts out all the problems , checks properly and thoroughly, i feel so relieved after the visit

review: The doctor is good however extremely disappointed to see that preference is given to patients having paid appointment. Doctor's services are meant to be a service.
